variables.issue_title: Implement Real-time Notification System for Student Activities
variables.issue_description: Design and implement a real-time notification system that alerts teachers and administrators about important student activities such as attendance updates, grade submissions, enrollment changes, and system announcements.
variables.acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Real-time notifications for attendance changes
- [ ] Grade submission alerts for teachers
- [ ] Enrollment status updates for administrators
- [ ] System-wide announcements capability
- [ ] User preference settings for notification types
- [ ] Email and in-app notification support
- [ ] Notification history and read/unread status
- [ ] Mobile-responsive notification UI
- [ ] Performance optimization for high-volume notifications
- [ ] Proper error handling and retry mechanisms
variables.additional_context:
This notification system is essential for keeping stakeholders informed about critical student activities. The system should be scalable to handle notifications for thousands of students and support both real-time updates and batch notifications.

**Technical Considerations:**
- Use SignalR for real-time web notifications
- Implement message queuing for reliable delivery
- Consider notification throttling to prevent spam
- Ensure GDPR compliance for notification data
- Support multiple notification channels (email, SMS, push)

**Priority Scenarios:**
1. Emergency attendance alerts
2. Critical grade updates
3. Enrollment deadline reminders
4. System maintenance notifications
